title: Federal judge rejects plea deal on hate-crime charges in Ahmaud Arbery's killing over sentencing concerns - CNN
content:
1. Federal judge rejects plea deal on hate-crime charges in Ahmaud Arbery's killing over sentencing concerns  CNN
  2. Federal Judge Rejects Plea Deal For Man Who Killed Ahmaud Arbery After Family Outrage  HuffPost
  3. Judge Rejects Terms Of Plea Deal For Killers Of Ahmaud Arbery  MSNBC
  4. Ahmaud Arbery Killing: Judge Rejects Hate-Crime Plea Deal  The New York Times
  5. Judge rejects plea deal in federal case of the death of Ahmaud Arbery  ABC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: US District Judge Lisa G. Wood on Monday rejected the plea deal reached by prosecutors and Travis McMichael on hate crime charges, a plan that would have precluded his federal trial in the killing of Ahmaud Arbery.
